sqlMap.select: SELECT EUSEQ, APPNO, MDSEQ, EQNO, UHSEQ, MODE, INSUNO, INSUNM, INGAENO, INGAENM, REGENO, REGENM, REGDT, MAILAPPROVAL, LASTMODDT FROM dbo.ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER_HISTORY WHERE MAILAPPROVAL = '0'

SELECT APP.APPNO, MAX(APP.APPNUM) AS APPNUM, MAX(APP.APPENO) AS APPENO, MAX(APP.APPENM) AS APPENM, (SELECT EMPD.cellno FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP ORAP INNER JOIN dbo.tbSVC_TDMSDETAIL EMPD ON EMPD.empno = ORAP.APPENO WHERE ORAP.APPNO = APP.APPNO) AS APPHP, MAX(APP.INSUNO) AS INSUNO, MAX(APP.INSUNM) AS INSUNM, (SELECT EMPD.cellno FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP ORAP INNER JOIN dbo.tbSVC_TDMSDETAIL EMPD ON EMPD.empno = ORAP.INSUNO WHERE ORAP.APPNO = APP.APPNO) AS INSUHP, DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), MAX(APP.ENDDT)) AS REMAINDT, (STUFF((SELECT ',' + EU.APPUENO FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER EU WHERE EU.APPNO = APP.APPNO FOR XML PATH('') ) ,1,1,'')) APPUENO, (STUFF((SELECT ',' + EU.APPUENM FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER EU WHERE EU.APPNO = APP.APPNO FOR XML PATH('') ) ,1,1,'')) APPUENM, (STUFF((SELECT ',' + CD.GBNM + '(' + EQ.EQALIAS + ')' FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER EU LEFT JOIN ONESTOP_RENT_EQUIP EQ ON EU.MDSEQ = EQ.MDSEQ AND EU.EQNO = EQ.EQNO LEFT JOIN ONESTOP_RENT_CODE CD ON EQ.GBCD = CD.GBCD WHERE EU.APPNO = APP.APPNO FOR XML PATH('') ) ,1,1,'')) EQALIAS, (STUFF((SELECT ',' + ISNULL(EMPD.cellno,'none') FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER EU LEFT JOIN dbo.tbSVC_TDMSDETAIL EMPD ON EU.APPUENO = EMPD.empno WHERE EU.APPNO = APP.APPNO FOR XML PATH('') ) ,1,1,'')) APPUEHP, MAX(APP.ENDDT) ENDDT FROM ONESTOP_RENT_APP APP INNER JOIN ONESTOP_RENT_APP_EQUIP_USER EU ON APP.APPNO = EU.APPNO WHERE STATUS = '4'
AND (DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 1 OR DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 3 OR DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 5 OR DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 10 OR DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 20 OR DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) = 30)
AND DATEDIFF(DD, GETDATE(), APP.ENDDT) < 0
GROUP BY APP.APPNO
